channel.title: Private server on a mac?
channel.description: I've been searching and searching for a tutorial on how to create and run a server on a Mac but have had no such luck. I can't get boot camp to work so I'm pretty much stuck with Apple for right now. If anyone has a link or if they know of a way to create and run a server on a Mac some help would be much appreciated.

item.title: Private server on a mac?
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

I’ve been searching and searching for a tutorial on how to create and run a server on a Mac but have had no such luck. I can’t get boot camp to work so I’m pretty much stuck with Apple for right now. If anyone has a link or if they know of a way to create and run a server on a Mac some help would be much appreciated.
